document_data.name: Troll Hills
document_data.mainbody: The '''Troll Hills''' were a series of hills along the coastal area of the [[Western Heartlands]]..

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The area was covered in [[oak]] trees, and the hilltops were dotted with patches of [[razorgrass]]. The Troll Hills were also home to [[tree-worm]]s, a species of flatworms that tasted terrible to everyone but trolls. Besides them and other insect species, these hills were largely devoid of birds and small woodland creatures, having been wiped out by the forest's monstrous inhabitants.

document_data.Inhabitants:
Trolls were the most predominant creature in this region,{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/Troll Mountains and Woods}} Many of them and allied creatures lived in caverns deep beneath its peaks.

Several competing troll kingdoms were found here.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Local rumors claimed that a [[drow]] city once stood beneath these hills, but that the drow destroyed all access to it once the area became overran by trolls.
